ygData.subject: Re: Hostage
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadow Wing:: She looked at Unitron. Let him go and take me in his stead. Or are you an honorless bot? She was trying to get them to exchange him for her.

Shadow Wing::

She looked at Unitron. "Let him go and take me in his stead. Or are 
you an honorless bot?" She was trying to get them to exchange him for 
her.  She knew that if she could get them to do that and release him 
unharmed, then the tide of the battle may turn in favor of the 
Maximals.
